statements: SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM passengers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT flight_number, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, email FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 AND age < 50;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK' AND arrival_airport = 'LAX';
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM passengers WHERE age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, passenger_id, flight_id FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM passengers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT passenger_id, email FROM passengers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_date ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM passengers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM passengers JOIN flights ON passengers.passenger_id = flights.flight_id
SELECT p.first_name, f.flight_number, f.departure_date FROM passengers p JOIN flights f ON p.passenger_id = f.flight_id WHERE p.first_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT name, email FROM passengers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(reservation_id) AS reservation_count FROM reservations GROUP BY passenger_id;
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_id, flight_number, reservation_date FROM reservations r JOIN flights f ON r.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT passenger_id, email FROM passengers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2021-10-01';

SELECT passengers.name, flights.flight_number, reservations.reservation_date FROM passengers INNER JOIN reservations ON passengers.passenger_id = reservations.passenger_id INNER JOIN flights ON reservations.flight_id = flights.flight_id;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT flight_id, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights WHERE airplane_model = 'Boeing 777';
SELECT reservation_id, seat_number, booking_status FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK' AND arrival_airport = 'LAX';
SELECT passenger_id, reservation_id FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY passenger_id HAVING num_reservations > 1 ORDER BY num_reservations DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT passenger_name, nationality FROM passengers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city='New York';
SELECT arrival_time, departure_time FROM flights WHERE destination_city='London';
SELECT * FROM reservations JOIN tickets ON reservations.reservation_id = tickets.reservation_id;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT passenger_name, nationality FROM passengers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT flight_id, departure_city, destination_city FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reservation_id, passenger_id, flight_id, reservation_date FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets JOIN reservations ON tickets.reservation_id = reservations.reservation_id WHERE ticket_class = 'Business';
